title: How to write essay about social media - Quora

response.answer_text: Hay friend, A better understanding about social media can lead you to write an essay about it. If you are someone related to social media, you are expected to cash your expertise into words. If you are not related to it, you will have to conduct a research about the topic. Additionally, you should first need to know the basic understanding of essay writing. The most important factor is, you must know the basic parts of an essay. There are 3 basic parts or sections of an article or essay. The introduction part, The body and the conclusion part. I would like to suggest you getting information about the main parts. Summing up the things … If you know about social media, you should directly study about the main parts of essay writing and then start writing.If you don’t know about the topic, it is strongly recommended to know about the topic first. After you make your knowledge properly, you will be able to write the essay.Follow the basic rules and practices for writing an article or essay. You can find it here. How To Write An Article ?Write the essay and get someone to review it, or have a look at it after some days. This way you cover each possible way to make your writing better than good.I hope it will surely help. Peace. Thanks all.

Here is a step by step guide for you: Narrow your topic to an exact aspect of social media that you want to analyze (a wide range of great social media essay topics along with introduction ideas and credible sources to cite can be found here)Do research or, to put it simply, google your narrowed topic making notes on interesting facts and evidenceDetermine your position/ main idea and 3 points that support this idea. Thus, develop a thesis statement and an essay structure around the main idea: lead into the topic and include a thesis statement in an introduction, develop each supporting point in 3 separate paragraphs, summarise the main idea in the conclusion.Start writing. Remember to carefully cite your sources and add your critical evaluation, conclusions, and interferences.Revise your writing making it more clear and concise (these editing strategies can help)Have an exciting writing experience!
